attributes.action: Make it law  to report a dead cat or kitten, that has been in a accident.
attributes.additional_details: People loose their beloved cats & kittens everyday due to this, some people don't even know their per has been hit or has died. These are peoples beloved pets and it should be made law to report it as it is with dogs.
attributes.background: Make it law that someone has to report a dead cat or kitten or if they have hit a cat or kitten with a vehicle, bike or motorbike.

rejection.details:
You may like to sign the below petitions we have open on this topic:

Make it an offence to hit a cat and drive off
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/591698

Require drivers to report hitting a cat, and scans for cats hit by a car
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/592811
